reply.author: magic watchface
reply.content: Dear Karim. Thank you for rating us ! We are gonna try our best to add this one feature into next version. Thanks !

author: Neil Forsythe
comment: My only gripe is that I can't change the time to 12hr time or see the notification peek. The time change animation is really cool though!

reply.author: magic watchface
reply.content:
Hi Neil, Really thank you for rating us!
 Your require was already reported to the Magic team. We will try our best to add this feature in next version ASAP. As we really wanna get 5 stars, so badly!

title: Great Watchface

author: Ramon Cofi
comment: To bad not work in my Samsung and sorry thank you

reply.author: magic watchface
reply.content: Dear Ramon, We are really sorry for this sort of inconvenience. This issue was already reported to Magic team, we will try our best to solve the issues ASAP. Before it. 1 Disconnect devices (watch&phone).2. Uninstall the watch face.3. Restart watch and connect to your phone again.4. Finally install the watch face and select “resync apps”in settings

author: Prime J
comment: The app is nice. but the digital time is not working. when the side button is pressed it just turns off the screen.

reply.author: magic watchface
reply.content:
Dear Carmel,
Sorry for this sort of inconvenience. We will try our best to fix this issue in next version ASAP.
Besides, you could follow below steps 1. Disconnect devices (watch and phone).
2. Uninstall the watch face.
3. Restart watch and connect to your phone again.
4. Finally install the watch face and select “resync apps”in settings
Thanks
